00046 sigar_cpu_t _prev_cpu, *_prev_cpup = NULL;

00049 const int DEFAULT_PAUSE = 500;
00050 
00051 // for unit conversion to/from MB/GB
00052 const double KiB = 1024.;
00053 const double MiB = KiB * 1024;
00054 const double GiB = MiB * 1024;
00055

00058 sigar_net_interface_stat_t _prev_net_stat, *_prev_net_statp = NULL;
00059 Stopwatch _net_stat_stopwatch;
00060 const int DEFAULT_NET_STAT_FLAGS =
00061     SIGAR_NETCONN_CLIENT|SIGAR_NETCONN_SERVER|SIGAR_NETCONN_TCP;

00085 sigar_t *sigar() {
00086   if (!_sigar)
00087     HT_ASSERT(sigar_open(&_sigar) == SIGAR_OK);
00088 
00089   return _sigar;
00090 }

00092 // we don't expect filesystem changes while the process is running
00093 sigar_file_system_list_t _fs_list, *_fs_listp = NULL;
00094 
00095 sigar_file_system_list_t &fs_list() {
00096   if (!_fs_listp) {
00097     HT_ASSERT(sigar_file_system_list_get(sigar(), &_fs_list) == SIGAR_OK);
00098     _fs_listp = &_fs_list;
00099   }
00100   return _fs_list;
00101 }
00102 
00103 bool compute_disk_usage(const char *prefix, sigar_disk_usage_t &u) {
00104   sigar_disk_usage_t t;
00105   sigar_file_system_t *fs = fs_list().data, *fs_end = fs + fs_list().number;
00106   size_t prefix_len = strlen(prefix);
00107   u.reads = u.writes = u.write_bytes = u.read_bytes = 0;
00108   size_t num_found = 0;
00109 
00110   for (; fs < fs_end; ++fs) {
00111     if (strncmp(prefix, fs->dir_name, prefix_len) == 0
00112         && sigar_disk_usage_get(sigar(), fs->dir_name, &t) == SIGAR_OK) {
00113       u.reads += t.reads;
00114       u.writes += t.writes;
00115       u.read_bytes += t.read_bytes;
00116       u.write_bytes += t.write_bytes;
00117       ++num_found;
00118     }
00119   }
00120   if (num_found > 0)
00121     return true;
00122 
00123   return false;
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool compute_fs_usage(const char *prefix, sigar_file_system_usage_t &u) {
00127   sigar_file_system_usage_t t;
00128   sigar_file_system_t *fs = fs_list().data, *fs_end = fs + fs_list().number;
00129   size_t prefix_len = strlen(prefix);
00130   u.use_percent = 0.;
00131   u.total = u.free = u.used = u.avail = u.files = u.free_files = 0;
00132   size_t num_found = 0;
00133 
00134   for (; fs < fs_end; ++fs) {
00135     if (strncmp(prefix, fs->dir_name, prefix_len) == 0
00136         && sigar_file_system_usage_get(sigar(), fs->dir_name, &t) == SIGAR_OK) {
00137 
00138       u.use_percent += t.use_percent * t.total; // for weighted mean;
00139       u.total += t.total;
00140       u.free += t.free;
00141       u.used += t.used;
00142       u.avail += t.avail;
00143       u.files += t.files;
00144       u.free_files += t.free_files;
00145       ++num_found;
00146     }
00147   }
00148   if (num_found > 0) {
00149     u.use_percent /= u.total;
00150     return true;
00151   }
00152   return false;
00153 }

00232 CpuInfo &CpuInfo::init() {
00233   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00234   sigar_cpu_info_list_t l;
00235 
00236   HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_info_list_get(sigar(), &l) == SIGAR_OK);
00237   sigar_cpu_info_t &s = l.data[0];
00238 
00239   vendor = s.vendor;
00240   model = s.model;
00241   mhz = s.mhz;
00242   cache_size = s.cache_size;
00243   total_sockets = s.total_sockets;
00244   total_cores = s.total_cores;
00245   cores_per_socket = s.cores_per_socket;
00246 
00247   sigar_cpu_info_list_destroy(sigar(), &l);
00248 
00249   return *this;
00250 }
00251 
00252 CpuStat &CpuStat::refresh() {
00253   ScopedRecLock cpu_lock(_cpu_mutex);
00254   bool need_pause = false;
00255   {
00256     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex); // needed for sigar object
00257 
00258     if (!_prev_cpup) {
00259       HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_get(sigar(), &_prev_cpu) == SIGAR_OK);
00260       _prev_cpup = &_prev_cpu;
00261       need_pause = true;
00262     }
00263   }
00264   if (need_pause)
00265     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00266   {
00267     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00268     sigar_cpu_t curr;
00269     HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_get(sigar(), &curr) == SIGAR_OK);
00270 
00271     sigar_cpu_perc_t p;
00272     HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_perc_calculate(&_prev_cpu, &curr, &p) == SIGAR_OK);
00273 
00274     user = p.user * 100.;
00275     sys = p.sys * 100.;
00276     nice = p.nice * 100.;
00277     idle = p.idle * 100.;
00278     wait = p.wait * 100.;
00279     irq = p.irq * 100.;
00280     soft_irq = p.soft_irq * 100.;
00281     stolen = p.stolen * 100.;
00282     total = p.combined * 100.;
00283 
00284     _prev_cpu = curr;
00285   }
00286   return *this;
00287 }
00288 
00289 MemStat &MemStat::refresh() {
00290   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00291   sigar_mem_t m;
00292 
00293   HT_ASSERT(sigar_mem_get(sigar(), &m) == SIGAR_OK);
00294 
00295   ram = m.ram;
00296   total = m.total / MiB;
00297   used = m.used / MiB;
00298   free = m.free / MiB;
00299   actual_used = m.actual_used / MiB;
00300   actual_free = m.actual_free / MiB;
00301 
00302   return *this;
00303 }
00304 
00305 DiskStat &DiskStat::refresh(const char *dir_prefix) {
00306   ScopedRecLock disk_lock(_disk_mutex);
00307   bool need_pause = false;
00308   {
00309     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00310 
00311     if ((prefix != dir_prefix || !_prev_disk_statp)
00312         && compute_disk_usage(dir_prefix, _prev_disk_stat)) {
00313       HT_DEBUGF("prev_disk_stat: reads=%llu, reads=%llu, read_bytes=%llu "
00314                 "write_bytes=%llu", (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.reads,
00315                 (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.writes, (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.read_bytes,
00316                 (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.write_bytes);
00317       _prev_disk_statp = &_prev_disk_stat;
00318       prefix = dir_prefix;
00319       need_pause = true;
00320     }
00321     prefix = dir_prefix;
00322   }
00323   if (need_pause)
00324     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00325   {
00326     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00327 
00328     if (_prev_disk_statp) {
00329       sigar_disk_usage_t s;
00330 
00331       if (compute_disk_usage(dir_prefix, s)) {
00332         HT_DEBUGF("curr_disk_stat: reads=%llu, reads=%llu, read_bytes=%llu "
00333                   "write_bytes=%llu", (Llu)s.reads, (Llu)s.writes,
00334                   (Llu)s.read_bytes, (Llu)s.write_bytes);
00335         _disk_stat_stopwatch.stop();
00336         double elapsed = _disk_stat_stopwatch.elapsed();
00337 
00338         reads_rate = (s.reads - _prev_disk_stat.reads) / elapsed;
00339         writes_rate = (s.writes - _prev_disk_stat.writes) / elapsed;
00340         read_rate =
00341             (s.read_bytes - _prev_disk_stat.read_bytes) / elapsed / MiB;
00342         write_rate =
00343             (s.write_bytes - _prev_disk_stat.write_bytes) / elapsed / MiB;
00344 
00345         _prev_disk_stat = s;
00346         _disk_stat_stopwatch.start();
00347       }
00348     }
00349   }
00350   return *this;
00351 }

00353 SwapStat &SwapStat::refresh() {
00354   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00355   sigar_swap_t s;
00356 
00357   HT_ASSERT(sigar_swap_get(sigar(), &s) == SIGAR_OK);
00358 
00359   total = s.total / MiB;
00360   used = s.used / MiB;
00361   free = s.free / MiB;
00362   page_in = s.page_in;
00363   page_out = s.page_out;
00364 
00365   return *this;
00366 }

00368 OsInfo &OsInfo::init() {
00369   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00370   sigar_sys_info_t s;
00371 
00372   HT_ASSERT(sigar_sys_info_get(sigar(), &s) == SIGAR_OK);
00373 
00374   name = s.name;
00375   version = s.version;
00376   arch = s.arch;
00377   machine = s.machine;
00378   description = s.description;
00379   patch_level = s.patch_level;
00380   vendor = s.vendor;
00381   vendor_version = s.vendor_version;
00382   vendor_name = s.vendor_name;
00383 
00384   return *this;
00385 }

00387 NetInfo &NetInfo::init() {
00388   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00389   sigar_net_interface_config_t ifc;
00390   sigar_net_info_t ni;
00391   char addrbuf[SIGAR_INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00392 
00393   HT_ASSERT(sigar_net_info_get(sigar(), &ni) == SIGAR_OK);
00394   host_name = ni.host_name;
00395   default_gw = ni.default_gateway;
00396 
00397   if (sigar_net_interface_config_primary_get(sigar(), &ifc) == SIGAR_OK) {
00398     primary_if = ifc.name;
00399     HT_ASSERT(sigar_net_address_to_string(sigar(), &ifc.address, addrbuf)
00400               == SIGAR_OK);
00401     primary_addr = addrbuf;
00402   }
00403   if (primary_addr.empty())
00404     primary_addr = "127.0.0.1";
00405 
00406   return *this;
00407 }
00408 
00409 NetStat &NetStat::refresh() {
00410   ScopedRecLock net_lock(_net_mutex);
00411   {
00412     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00413     sigar_net_stat_t s;
00414 
00415     if (sigar_net_stat_get(sigar(), &s, DEFAULT_NET_STAT_FLAGS) == SIGAR_OK) {
00416       tcp_established = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_ESTABLISHED];
00417       tcp_listen = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_LISTEN];
00418       tcp_time_wait = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_TIME_WAIT];
00419       tcp_close_wait = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT];
00420       tcp_idle = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_IDLE];
00421     }
00422     else {
00423       tcp_established = tcp_listen = tcp_time_wait = tcp_close_wait =
00424           tcp_idle = 0;
00425     }
00426   }
00427   bool need_pause = false;
00428   const char *ifname = System::net_info().primary_if.c_str();
00429   {
00430     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00431 
00432     if (!_prev_net_statp) {
00433       if (sigar_net_interface_stat_get(sigar(), ifname, &_prev_net_stat)
00434           == SIGAR_OK) {
00435         _prev_net_statp = &_prev_net_stat;
00436         _net_stat_stopwatch.start();
00437         HT_DEBUGF("prev_net_stat: rx_bytes=%llu, tx_bytes=%llu",
00438                   (Llu)_prev_net_stat.rx_bytes, (Llu)_prev_net_stat.tx_bytes);
00439         need_pause = true;
00440       }
00441       else {
00442         rx_rate = tx_rate = 0;
00443       }
00444     }
00445   }
00446   if (need_pause)
00447     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00448   {
00449     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00450 
00451     if (_prev_net_statp) {
00452       sigar_net_interface_stat_t curr;
00453 
00454       if (sigar_net_interface_stat_get(sigar(), ifname, &curr) == SIGAR_OK) {
00455         _net_stat_stopwatch.stop();
00456         double elapsed = _net_stat_stopwatch.elapsed();
00457         HT_DEBUGF("curr_net_stat: rx_bytes=%llu, tx_bytes=%llu",
00458                   (Llu)curr.rx_bytes, (Llu)curr.tx_bytes);
00459 
00460         rx_rate = (curr.rx_bytes - _prev_net_stat.rx_bytes) / elapsed / KiB;
00461         tx_rate = (curr.tx_bytes - _prev_net_stat.tx_bytes) / elapsed / KiB;
00462 
00463         _prev_net_stat = curr;
00464         _net_stat_stopwatch.start();
00465       }
00466     }
00467   }
00468   return *this;
00469 }

00471 ProcInfo &ProcInfo::init() {
00472   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00473   sigar_proc_exe_t exeinfo;
00474   sigar_proc_args_t arginfo;
00475   sigar_proc_cred_name_t name;
00476 
00477   pid = sigar_pid_get(sigar());
00478   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_exe_get(sigar(), pid, &exeinfo) == SIGAR_OK);
00479   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_args_get(sigar(), pid, &arginfo) == SIGAR_OK);
00480   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_cred_name_get(sigar(), pid, &name) == SIGAR_OK);
00481 
00482   user = name.user;
00483   exe = exeinfo.name;
00484   cwd = exeinfo.cwd;
00485   root = exeinfo.root;
00486 
00487   for (size_t i = 0; i < arginfo.number; ++i)
00488     args.push_back(arginfo.data[i]);
00489 
00490   sigar_proc_args_destroy(sigar(), &arginfo);
00491 
00492   return *this;
00493 }
00494 
00495 ProcStat &ProcStat::refresh() {
00496   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00497   sigar_proc_cpu_t c;
00498   sigar_proc_mem_t m;
00499 
00500   sigar_pid_t pid = sigar_pid_get(sigar());
00501   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_cpu_get(sigar(), pid, &c) == SIGAR_OK);
00502   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_mem_get(sigar(), pid, &m) == SIGAR_OK);
00503 
00504   cpu_user = c.user;
00505   cpu_sys = c.sys;
00506   cpu_total = c.total;
00507   cpu_pct = c.percent * 100.;
00508   vm_size = m.size / MiB;
00509   vm_resident = m.resident / MiB;
00510   vm_share = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.share) ? 0 : m.share / MiB;
00511   minor_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.minor_faults) ? 0 : m.minor_faults;
00512   major_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.major_faults) ? 0 : m.major_faults;
00513   page_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.page_faults) ? 0 : m.page_faults;;
00514 
00515   return *this;
00516 }
00517 
00518 FsStat &FsStat::refresh(const char *dir_prefix) {
00519   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00520   sigar_file_system_usage_t u;
00521   prefix = dir_prefix;
00522 
00523   if (compute_fs_usage(dir_prefix, u)) {
00524     use_pct = u.use_percent * 100.;
00525     total = u.total / MiB; // u.total already in KB
00526     free = u.free / MiB;
00527     used = u.used / MiB;
00528     avail = u.avail / MiB;
00529     files = u.files;
00530     free_files = u.free_files;
00531   }
00532   return *this;
00533 }
00534 
00535 TermInfo &TermInfo::init() {
00536   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00537   int err;
00538 
00539   if (setupterm(0,  1, &err) != ERR) {
00540     term = getenv("TERM");
00541     num_lines = lines;
00542     num_cols = columns;
00543   }
00544   else {
00545     term = "dumb";
00546     num_lines = 24;
00547     num_cols = 80;
00548   }
00549   return *this;
00550 }

00552 const char *system_info_lib_version() {
00553   sigar_version_t *v = sigar_version_get();
00554   return v->description;
00555 }
00556 
00557 std::ostream &system_info_lib_version(std::ostream &out) {
00558   sigar_version_t *v = sigar_version_get();
00559   out <<"{SigarVersion: build_date='"<< v->build_date <<"' scm_revision='"
00560       << v->scm_revision <<"'\n version='"<< v->version <<"' archname='"
00561       << v->archname <<"'\n archlib='"<< v->archlib <<"' binname='"
00562       << v->binname <<"'\n description='"<< v->description <<"'\n major="
00563       << v->major <<" minor="<< v->minor <<" maint="<< v->maint <<" build="
00564       << v->build <<'}';
00565   return out;
00566 }

00571       <<"\n total_sockets="<< i.total_sockets <<" total_cores="<< i.total_cores
00572       <<" cores_per_socket="<< i.cores_per_socket <<'}';
00573   return out;

00620 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const NetStat &s) {
00621   out <<"{NetStat: rx_rate="<< s.rx_rate <<" tx_rate="<< s.tx_rate
00622       <<" tcp_established="<< s.tcp_established <<" tcp_listen="
00623       << s.tcp_listen <<"\n tcp_time_wait="<< s.tcp_time_wait
00624       <<" tcp_close_wait="<< s.tcp_close_wait <<'}';
00625   return out;
00626 }
00627 
00628 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const ProcInfo &i) {
00629   out <<"{ProcInfo: pid="<< i.pid <<" user="<< i.user <<" exe='"<< i.exe
00630       <<"'\n cwd='"<< i.cwd <<"' root='"<< i.root <<"'\n args=[";
00631 
00632   foreach(const String &arg, i.args)
00633     out <<"'"<< arg <<"', ";
00634 
00635   out <<"]}";
00636   return out;
00637 }

00640   out <<"{ProcStat: cpu_user="<< s.cpu_user <<" cpu_sys="<< s.cpu_sys
00641       <<" cpu_total="<< s.cpu_total <<" cpu_pct="<< s.cpu_pct
